author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

* Add DDDetector Producer from DB that is now an IdealGeometryRecord
* Cleanup and streamline Geometry Records
* Revert changes to IdealMagneticFieldRecord - no need to depend on GeometryFileRcd

@namapane - Please, take the ```DetectorDescription/DDCMS/plugins/DDDetectorESProducer.cc``` as an example for a MF producer from DB. I didn't want to introduce yet another set of configurable parameters here.

@cvuosalo - there is a problem (under investigation) with reading the geometry payloads from DB. The job to run is:
```
cmsRun DetectorDescription/DDCMS/test/python/testGeometry2021FromDB.py
```
This PR does not intend to solve it.
